title: Intelligent Fleet Management Platform
metaDesc: Enterprise-grade fleet management platform integrating Cloud SaaS, Mobile Apps, and Open API for total operational visibility.

blocks.title: The All-In-One Fleet Intelligence Platform
blocks.subtitle: Unify your operations with a complete ecosystem. From our powerful Cloud SaaS and intuitive Mobile Apps to flexible Open API integrationsâ€”we provide the infrastructure for smarter fleet decisions.

items.title: Cloud SaaS Portal
items.desc: Centralized command center to monitor fleet status, replay routes, and manage drivers from any browser.

items.title: Mobile Ecosystem
items.desc: Native iOS and Android apps empowering fleet managers and drivers to stay connected on the go.

items.title: Open API Engine
items.desc: Seamlessly integrate fleet data with your existing ERP, CRM, or custom applications via our RESTful API.

items.title: Advanced Analytics
items.desc: Transform raw data into actionable insights with predictive maintenance and fuel usage reports.

items.title: Enterprise Security
items.desc: Bank-level encryption (AES-256), SSO support, and granular role-based access control (RBAC).

items.title: Real-Time Telematics
items.desc: High-precision GPS tracking with sub-second updates and live video streaming integration.

items.title: Operations Dashboard
items.desc: The three major reports on operations, safety, and data enable management to have a more comprehensive and precise understanding of the dynamics and trends of the commercial vehicle fleet.

items.title: Real-Time GPS Location
items.desc: Through the device to obtain real-time vehicle location and vehicle information, including speed, vehicle status, mileage, driving time, etc.

items.title: Video Surveillance
items.desc: It can play real-time vehicle monitoring video, and supports simultaneous browsing, capture, and video parameter setting of multiple vehicles.

items.title: Remote Control
items.desc: It can carry out remote capture, intercom, PTZ control, parameter configuration and other operations on the vehicle.

items.title: Video & Track Playback
items.desc: Query the route trajectory of each vehicle in the past, displaying information such as stopping points, alarm times, and speed curves during the journey; playback video data from each channel for a specific time period in the past for every vehicle, and support downloading to the local system

items.title: Geo Fence
items.desc: An electronic fence zone can be set up, and an alert will be triggered whenever a vehicle enters or exits the zone.

items.title: Multi-platform integration
items.desc: The platform supports interconnectivity across multiple terminals including web, PC, mini programs, and mobile apps.
